title: Man found fatally shot in Md. on Monday identified as 19-year-old Oxon Hill resident
text:
Police are trying to determine a motive and locate a suspect or suspects. Police said they don’t think it was a “random crime.”

A reward is being offered for information about the shooting, authorities said.

The killing comes as the D.C. region has seen 224 homicides so far this year, according to tracking done by The Washington Post. Of those, 57 have been in Prince George’s.

Local newsletters: Local headlines (8 a.m.) | Afternoon Buzz (4 p.m.)

AD
description: The shooting happened just off Indian Head Highway.
